statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
Multiple query, for each n, you need to get
n i-1
�� �� [gcd(i + j, i - j) = 1]
i=1 j=1

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
On the first line, there is a positive integer T, which describe the number of queries. Next there are T lines, each line give a positive integer n, as mentioned above.
T<=1e5, n<=2e7

statement.title: Output
statement.content: Your output should include T lines, for each line, output the answer for the corre- sponding n.
